full_summary:
## Senior Technical Clerk Position

### **Title, Dates and Contract Details**

* Title: Senior Technical Clerk
* Job Reference: PW-22-01010684
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: W8485-TSPS2023-08/A
* Publication Date: 20 October 2022
* Tender Closing Date (23:59 ET): 29 November 2022
* Amendment Date: 10 November 2022

### **Description and Requirements**

The Department of National Defence is inviting qualified suppliers to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Task and Solutions Professional Services. This requirement is part of a larger bid solicitation open to pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) method of supply.

The Department of National Defence requires the services of one (1) Senior Technical Clerk (Level 3) to provide support for Directorate Aerospace Equipment Program Management (TA&S) 4-3-4.

**Key Requirements:**

* Possess a GSI-number of R008A: Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services, excluding armament, R&D and R&O
* Security clearance level required: Secret (FSC-S)
* Work location: National Capital Region, specific locations: 455 Blvd de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC

**Contract Details:**

* Expected contract duration: 3 years plus 2 irrevocable option years
* Estimated level of effort: 240 days per year

**RFP Documents:**

RFP documents will be e-mailed directly to the qualified suppliers. The documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System.

### **Submission Requirements:**

* Suppliers who wish to be considered must submit their proposal documents to the Department of National Defence in accordance with the RFP requirements.

### **Contact Information:**

Tony Seng (DND POC)

* Email: [tony.seng@forces.gc.ca](mailto:tony.seng@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (819) 939-4148
* Office Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

### **Additional Information:**

For general information on the various Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) methods of supply, or to obtain specific information on a PWGSC professional service method of supply, please visit PWGSC's Buy and Sell website at [https://buyandsell.gc
